Please review the following before deleting your account.
계정삭제.삭제 후에는 복구가 불가능하며 서비스 이용과 관련된 정보가 모두 사라집니: Once deleted, your account cannot be restored and all related service data will be permanently removed.
계정삭제.회원 탈퇴가 완료되면 아래의 개인정보 및 계정 관련 데이터는 즉시 삭제되: When your account deletion is complete, all personal information and account-related data will be immediately deleted and cannot be restored.
계정삭제.삭제 항목은 이름, 즐겨찾는 프린터, 게시물, 그 외 계정과 연결된 모든: Deleted items include your name, favorite printers, posts, and all other personal information and usage data linked to your account.
All data will be deleted immediately once the account deletion process is complete.
계정삭제.전자상거래법, 통신비밀보호법 등 관련 법령의 규정에 의하여 아래 개인정보: In accordance with applicable laws such as the Electronic Commerce Act and the Communications Privacy Act, certain personal information must be retained for a specified period
Records related to contracts or cancellations: 5 years
Records of payments and supply of goods/services: 5 years
Records of consumer complaints or dispute resolution: 3 years
계정삭제.서비스 부정 이용 방지 및 악성 사용자 재가입 차단을 위해:
To prevent fraudulent use of the service and block re-registration of malicious users, the email address and device identifier used at sign-up will be retained for 3 years after account deletion. After this period, the data will be permanently destroyed in a secure manner.
(Based on Articles 15, 17, and 21 of the Personal Information Protection Act)
Retained items: Sign-up email, device ID
Retention period: 3 years
Purpose: To block abusive users and maintain service stability
계정삭제.회원 탈퇴 시 보유 중인 치즈는 자동 소멸되며 탈퇴 후 복구·환불이 불가: Upon account deletion, any unused Cheez will automatically expire and cannot be restored or refunded.
계정삭제.이는 회원의 자발적인 탈퇴 의사에 따른 것이며: Since account deletion is voluntary, we strongly recommend using all remaining balance before proceeding.
Retained items: Records of unused paid Cheez before account deletion
Status: Deleted immediately after account deletion is completed, non-refundable
계정삭제.(전자상거래법 제17조에 근거합니다): (Based on Article 17 of the Electronic Commerce Act)
계정삭제.회원 탈퇴가 완료되면 계정과 관련된 모든 데이터는 영구 삭제되며:
Once your account deletion is complete, all account-related data will be permanently deleted.
Even if you re-register with the same account, your data cannot be restored.
Please back up any necessary data before deleting your account.
계정삭제.환불 요청, 결제 취소, 배송, 정산 등 진행 중인 거래나: Account deletion is only possible after all pending transactions or services are completed (e.g., refund requests, payment cancellations, deliveries, settlements).
계정삭제.미처리 건이 있는 상태에서 탈퇴를 신청하실 경우: If you request account deletion while transactions are still pending, the deletion process will begin only once those items are fully resolved.
계정삭제.{{nickname}}님이 보유한 모든 치즈는 삭제되며 복구할 수 없습니: All Cheez owned by {{nickname}} will be deleted and cannot be restored.
I have reviewed all the notes and agree to delete my account.
계정삭제.계정을 삭제하시겠어요?: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
All your service history will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.

Cancellation is possible until printing begins.
주문 확인.인쇄 특성상 색이 다소 번지거나 벗겨질 수 있으며,: Due to printing characteristics, colors may bleed or fade, and the actual print may appear darker than on screen.
주문 확인.인쇄물은 화면과 다를 수 있으며,: Printed materials may differ from the screen, and slight variations may occur depending on resolution and image cropping.

스탬프투어.일회용 필름카메라 (선착순 200명 한정): Disposable film cameras (limited to the first 200 people)
스탬프투어.본 이벤트는 당사 사정에 의해 예고 없이 변경되거나: This event may change or end early without prior notice depending on company circumstances.
스탬프투어.일회용 필름카메라 경품은 선착순 200명에게 지급되며,: The disposable film camera prize is limited to the first 200 winners. Once stock runs out, the giveaway will close. Depending on participation, separate thank-you benefits may be provided to those who complete later missions.
스탬프투어.부정한 방법(위치 조작, 계정 도용 등)으로 이벤트에 참여한 것이 확인될: If participation through fraudulent means (location spoofing, account theft, etc.) is confirmed, all benefits will be revoked and the account may be restricted.
스탬프투어.네트워크 오류 등으로 스탬프가 정상적으로 적립되지 않은 경우,: If stamps are not properly collected due to network errors, please contact customer support.
Make sure your information is correct so we can deliver your ‘Photo Album’ without delay.
Make sure your information is correct so we can deliver your 'Film Camera’ without delay.
스탬프투어.입력하신 정보는 경품 배송 목적으로만 사용되며,: The information you enter will only be used for prize delivery and will be securely deleted within 30 days after delivery is complete.
스탬프투어.잘못된 정보 입력으로 인한 배송 오류(오배송, 분실 등)는 책임지지 않습: We are not responsible for delivery errors (misdelivery, loss, etc.) caused by incorrect information. Please make sure your details are correct.
스탬프투어.경품 배송은 국내 및 해외 주소 모두 가능하나,: Prizes can be shipped to both domestic and international addresses, but delivery may be delayed or incur additional costs in remote or special areas.
스탬프투어.배송은 이벤트 종료일로부터 순차적으로 진행되며,: Shipping will begin sequentially after the event ends. Delivery times may vary depending on region and courier conditions, and additional costs may apply.
